description: This file defines the CombinedKnowledgeBase class, which aggregates multiple AgentKnowledge sources and provides methods to iterate over their document lists, both synchronously and asynchronously.

classes.name: CombinedKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class that combines multiple AgentKnowledge sources and provides iterators over their documents.

methods.name: document_lists
methods.description: Synchronous generator property that yields lists of documents from each knowledge source.

methods.name: async_document_lists
methods.description: Asynchronous generator property that yields lists of documents from each knowledge source.
